mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Address (address_id,user_id, address, address_name, address_latitude, address_longitude, address_role) VALUES (#{addressId},#{userId}, #{address}, #{addressName}, #{addressLatitude}, #{addressLongitude}, #{addressRole})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Address WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND address_role = 1 LIMIT 1

SELECT A.address_id, A.user_id, A.address, A.address_name, A.address_latitude, A.address_longitude, A.address_role FROM address A JOIN orders O ON A.user_id = O.user_id WHERE O.order_id = #{orderId} AND A.user_id = #{userId} AND A.address_role = 1
